attributes.action: Publicly condemn human rights abuses in, and apply pressure on the United States to close, the Guantánamo Bay military prison in Cuba
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 5th year anniversary I would urge the Prime Minister to apply whatever pressure he is able to on the Bush administration to close Guantánamo Bay and insist on a fair trial for it's prisoners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
